author: arfrever
msg: Fix printing summary of tests results when using Python 3.

author: gstein
msg: Replace (incorrect) SVN_ERR_ASSERT macros with the new SVN_TEST_ASSERT.

author: gstein
msg: This revision has a few diverse things in it -- I had started to write a
new test, wrote some support bits, and realized that I needed to be a bit
more drastic about using the new stuff. Snapshotting now for some more
(SVN_TEST_ASSERT): new macro to assert a test condition
(SVN_TEST_WIMP_COND0): no need for an obsolete unused macro. new wimp
tests can use the new macro.
(validate_abspath): helper function to validate abspath return values
assertions with paired uses of SVN_TEST_ASSERT and validate_abspath

author: kou
msg: Make RSS title and description customizable.
(Svn::CommitMailer#apply_options): Set specified RSS title and description.
(Svn::CommitMailer#make_options): Set default RSS title and description.
(Svn::CommitMailer#make_rss): Use rss_title only for RSS title and
